TopicTitle: MASSIVE frame rate drop when reentry effects happen

Articles.Content:
Is anybody else having this issue? Whenever I launch a vessel and it goes above 20 km and the effects kick in, my frame rate drops down to less than one frame per second.

I don't think it's mod related, but I'll post a list of you guys think it would help.

Edit: I fixed it, it was because I was running in OpenGL mode.

Edited November 10, 2015 by macintux

The Unity hair shader is very slow, it runs in software on the CPU because Unity's PhysX does not make use of the 3D graphics card.

The only option is to lower your aeroFX setting.
I did that and it still happened. This didn't happen under 1.0.4, though.
So even when i crossfire my 6950 in a week that wont do anything? I have a watercooled i5 4690k OC to 4.25 and granted with one card im getting average 10fps.. It didnt used to be this bad
